text: Calvin Marshall Trillin (born 5 December 1935) is an American journalist, humorist, food writer, poet, memoirist and novelist. From 1975 to 1987, Trillin wrote articles for Moment Magazine. He has also written for The Nation magazine. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American poets Category:American autobiographers Category:American novelists Category:American food and drink critics Category:American journalists Category:Writers from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Memoirists
title: Calvin Trillin
